sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Purpose: Given a keyword, search active knowledge articles and return their titles as a JSON array.
Inputs: keyword (String)
Outputs: article_titles (String, JSON Array)
Implementation: Script step querying kb_knowledge table
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Search Knowledge Articles by Keyword
